verses.roman:
gopīnātha kahe,--nāma śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya
guru iṅhāra keśava-bhāratī mahā-dhanya

synonyms: gopīnātha kahe—Gopīnātha Ācārya replied; nāma—His name; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—of the name Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya; guru—sannyāsa-guru; iṅhāra—His; keśava-bhāratī—of the name Keśava Bhāratī; mahā-dhanya—the greatly fortunate personality.
translation: Gopīnātha Ācārya replied, "The Lord's name is Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya, and His sannyāsa preceptor is the greatly fortunate Keśava Bhāratī."
